models.name: csma
models.full-name: IEEE 802.3 CSMA/CD (Carrier Sense, Multiple Access with Collision Detection) protocol
models.notes: Number of stations is fixed at N=2.

models.name: csma_abst
models.full-name: IEEE 802.3 CSMA/CD (Carrier Sense, Multiple Access with Collision Detection) protocol (abstract model)
models.notes: Number of stations is fixed at N=2.

models.name: firewire

params.name: delay
params.description: maximum wire transmission delay, in units of 10ns

models.notes: PTA model from [KNS03b] based on TA model from [SS01].

models.name: firewire_abst
models.full-name: IEEE 1394 FireWire root contention protocol (abstract model)

params.name: delay
params.description: maximum wire transmission delay, in units of 10ns

models.notes: PTA model from [KNS03b] based on manual abstraction from [SV99].

models.name: repudiation_honest
models.notes: The protocol is due to Markowitch & Roggeman [MR99].

models.name: repudiation_malicious
models.notes: The protocol is due to Markowitch & Roggeman [MR99].
